summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3027, for the improvement of the alley in block 136, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition, being the alley from Spring Street to Seneca Street and between Boylston Avenue and Harvard Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36449 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
